original_text: The judge may decide that his officers should beat the guilty person as punishment. The judge will make him lie down on the ground. Then he will watch as his officers beat the guilty person. They will hit him as many times as he deserves because of his wicked act.
korean_text: 악인에게 태형이 합당하면 재판장은 그를 엎드리게 하고 그 앞에서 그의 죄에 따라 수를 맞추어 때리게 하라

sentences.original_text: that his officers should beat the guilty person
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 관원들이 죄 있는 자를 매질해야 한다고

sentences.original_text: The judge will make him lie down
as his officers beat the guilty person
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 관원들이 죄 있는 자를 매질하는 것을

sentences.original_text: as many times as he deserves
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 마땅히 받아야 할 만큼 많이
